name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatBot AI - ChatGPT & Claude & Bard & Bing
name.ja: CChatBot AI アシスタント - ChatGPT & Claude & Bard
name.ko: ChatBot AI 어시스턴트 - ChatGPT & Claude & Bard
name.zh_CN: ChatBot AI助手 - ChatGPT & Claude & Bard...
name.zh_TW: ChatBot AI助手 - ChatGPT & Claude & Bard & Bing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatBot is a copilot that uses ChatGPT, Bing, Claude, Bard, and more to answer questions like translations, emails, Q&As, and more.
short.ja: ChatBot は、ChatGPT、Bing、Claude などを使用して、翻訳、電子メール、Q&A などの質問に対する回答を提供する副操縦士です。
short.ko: ChatBot은 ChatGPT, Bing, Claude, Bard 등을 사용하여 번역, 이메일, Q&A 등의 질문에 대한 답변을 제공하는 부조종사입니다.
short.zh_CN: ChatBot AI助手是一个能同时使用ChatGPT、Bing、Bard、Claude等多个机器人，能回答各种问题，包括翻译、写邮件、问答等
short.zh_TW: ChatBot AI助手是一個能同時使用ChatGPT、Bing、Bard、Claude等多個機器人，能回答各種問題，包括翻譯、寫郵件、問答等

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,fa,fi,:
ChatBot AI assistant as your copilot, able to answer any complex question. Supports multiple models such as ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, and Bing, and can be used together.

💻 Feature Highlights:
1️⃣ Supports multiple models, e.g. ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, Bing
2️⃣Powerful sidebar
      ✅ ChatGPT Translator
      ✅ ChatGPT Dictionary
      ✅ Grammar check
      ✅ Customize any prompt
3️⃣ Easy to access
      ✅ Support ChatGPT API key, support GPT-3.5, GPT-4
      ✅Supports Claude API key
      ✅ Support iFlytek
4️⃣Theme
      ✅Support dark/light mode
      ✅Supports multiple color adjustments
5️⃣ ChatGPT/Claude/Bard response page:
      ✅ Markdown rendering
      ✅ Code highlighting
      ✅ Stop generating responses
      ✅ Copy response to clipboard
6️⃣ Many features to enhance your reading
7️⃣ Copywriting : Many features to optimize your writing
8️⃣ Free
9️⃣ Easy to use
🔟 Most importantly, your voice matters! 🗣 And we will continue to improve

💻 Features:
💡Chatbot: Open the extension, you can easily chat and talk about anything, all of which are supported by GPT-4/GPT-3.5/Claude API/Bard, as smart as ChatGPT/Claude/Bard.
💡 Copywriting: Use artificial intelligence capabilities to easily create advertising copy.
💡 Prompt Library: This is a promptbase that provides a large number of prompts based on ChatGPT, GPT-3.5, and GPT-4.
💡 Quick Action: Translate, paraphrase and paraphrase text on any web page.

❇️ How it works:
ChatBot AI Assistant uses the powerful features of ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, etc. to understand and respond to your chat messages and generate copy based on the provided templates. You can also translate, paraphrase and explain the text on any web page.

📒 Details:
Currently, GPT-3, GPT-3.5, GPT-4 and other models are supported. You can write, translate, summarize, rewrite, explain or reply to any text with one click, even professional code and industry core knowledge. Runs as fast as ChatGPT Plus.

🔥Main advantages and capabilities of ChatBot AI Assistant:
1. Connect with various models such as the most advanced GPT-3.5 and GPT-4.
2. There are more than 100 built-in templates, which can help you write articles, advertisement outlines, blogs, resumes, etc. with one click.
3. Can rewrite, translate, explain any copy on the webpage.
4. Chat with Chatgpt, Claude, Bard, Bing, etc. anytime, anywhere as your personal assistant.
5. You can customize your own prompt, so that Chatgpt can serve you better.
6. 100% Privacy Policy.

⚙️ Specific function list:
➤ Powerful sidebar
   1. Chat with Chatgpt anytime, support GPT-3.5, GPT-4.
   2. Customizable prompt.
   4. Supports all historical chat queries.
➤ Quick wake up
   2. The memory usage of the browser is small, and the Chatgpt experience does not freeze.
➤ Search enhancements
   1. Support Google, newBing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines.
   2. The search results show the answers provided by Chatgpt.
➤ Built-in templates
   1. Built-in 80+ templates, support, Gmail email writing, LinkedIn resume writing, etc.
   2. If you are not satisfied with the official template, you can also customize the template, so that you can better serve Chatgpt for you.
The above functions all support GPT-3.5, and some support GPT-4.

⚒️ Models or functions that may be supported in the future



❓ FAQ:
📌 Are you considering adding more models?
   1. As written above, we will keep updating with Chatgpt synchronously in the future. If there is GPT-5 in the future, we will support it as soon as possible. And we will keep paying attention to the capabilities provided by Excel-Chatgpt, sql-Chatgpt, Mini-Chatgpt, claude, brad, etc. Maybe you can see these functions in the future.

⚙️ Models that may be supported in the future:
- GPT-5 model
- claude model
- brad model
-Auto-Gpt
-Agent-GPt
- Excel-GPT
-MIni-Chatgpt
-SQL-GPT
-PRD-GPT
- Code-chatgpt

➤ Quick wake up
   2. The memory usage of the browser is small, and the Chatgpt experience does not freeze.
➤ Search enhancements
   1. Support Google, newBing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines.
   2. The search results show the answers provided by Chatgpt.
➤ Built-in templates
   1. Built-in 80+ templates, support, Gmail email writing, LinkedIn resume writing, etc.
   2. If you are not satisfied with the official template, you can also customize the template, so that you can better serve Chatgpt for you.
The above functions all support GPT-3.5, and some support GPT-4.

💻 Feature Highlights:
1️⃣ Supports multiple models, e.g. ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, Bing

8️⃣ Free
9️⃣ Easy to use

💻 Features:
💡Chatbot: Open the extension, you can easily chat and talk about anything, all of which are supported by GPT-4/GPT-3.5/Claude API/Bard, as smart as ChatGPT/Claude/Bard.
💡 Copywriting: Use artificial intelligence capabilities to easily create advertising copy.
💡 Prompt Library: This is a promptbase that provides a large number of prompts based on ChatGPT, GPT-3.5, and GPT-4.
💡 Quick Action: Translate, paraphrase and paraphrase text on any web page.

❇️ How it works:
ChatBot AI Assistant uses the powerful features of ChatGPT, Claude, Bard, etc. to understand and respond to your chat messages and generate copy based on the provided templates. You can also translate, paraphrase and explain the text on any web page.

📒 Details:
Currently, GPT-3, GPT-3.5, GPT-4 and other models are supported. You can write, translate, summarize, rewrite, explain or reply to any text with one click, even professional code and industry core knowledge. Runs as fast as ChatGPT Plus.

🔥Main advantages and capabilities of ChatBot AI Assistant:
1. Connect with various models such as the most advanced GPT-3.5 and GPT-4.
2. There are more than 100 built-in templates, which can help you write articles, advertisement outlines, blogs, resumes, etc. with one click.
3. Can rewrite, translate, explain any copy on the webpage.
4. Chat with Chatgpt, Claude, Bard, Bing, etc. anytime, anywhere as your personal assistant.
5. You can customize your own prompt, so that Chatgpt can serve you better.
6. 100% Privacy Policy.

⚙️ Specific function list:
➤ Powerful sidebar
   1. Chat with Chatgpt anytime, support GPT-3.5, GPT-4.
   2. Customizable prompt.
   4. Supports all historical chat queries.
➤ Quick wake up
   2. The memory usage of the browser is small, and the Chatgpt experience does not freeze.
➤ Search enhancements
   1. Support Google, newBing, DuckDuckGo and other search engines.
   2. The search results show the answers provided by Chatgpt.
➤ Built-in templates
   1. Built-in 80+ templates, support, Gmail email writing, LinkedIn resume writing, etc.
   2. If you are not satisfied with the official template, you can also customize the template, so that you can better serve Chatgpt for you.
The above functions all support GPT-3.5, and some support GPT-4.

long.zh_CN:
ChatBot AI助手作为你的副驾驶，能够回答任何复杂的问题。支持ChatGPT、Claude、Bard、Bing等多个模型一起使用。

选择我们的原因
1️⃣ 支持多个模型使用，例如：ChatGPT、Claude、Bard、Bing
2️⃣强大的侧边栏
     ✅ ChatGPT 翻译器
     ✅ ChatGPT 词典
     ✅ 语法检查
     ✅ 自定义任何提示
3️⃣ 容易访问
     ✅ 支持 ChatGPT API 密钥，支持GPT-3.5、GPT-4
     ✅ 支持Claude API 密钥
     ✅ 支持国内讯飞
4️⃣ 主题
     ✅ 支持暗/亮模式
     ✅ 支持多种颜色调节
5️⃣ ChatGPT/Claude/Bard 响应页面:
     ✅ Markdown 渲染
     ✅ 代码高亮
     ✅ 停止生成响应
     ✅ 将响应复制到剪贴板
6️⃣ 许多功能以增强您的阅读
7️⃣ 许多功能以优化您的写作
8️⃣ 免费
9️⃣ 易于使用
🔟 最重要的是，您的声音至关重要！🗣 并且我们将持续改进

💻 功能特性:
💡 Chatbot:打开扩展，即可轻松聊天，谈论任何事情，这一切都由GPT-4/GPT-3.5/Claude API/Bard支持，与ChatGPT/Claude/Bard同样智能。
💡 Copywriting:利用人工智能能力轻松创建广告文案。
💡 Prompt Library:这是一个promptbase，提供了大量的基于Chatgpt、GPT-3.5、GPT-4的prompt。
💡 Quick Action:翻译、改述和解释任何网页上的文本。

❇️ 如何工作:
ChatBot AI助手使用ChatGPT、Claude、Bard等的强大功能来理解和响应您的聊天消息，并基于提供的模板生成文案。 还可以翻译、改述和解释任何网页上的文本。

📒 详情介绍:
目前，支持 GPT-3、GPT-3.5、GPT-4 等模型。您可以一键编写、翻译、总结、改写、解释或回复任何文本，甚至包括专业代码和行业核心知识。  运行速度与 ChatGPT Plus 一样快。

🔥 ChatBot AI助手的主要优势和能力:
1. 对接最先进的GPT-3.5和GPT-4等多种模型。
2. 内置80多个模板，可以一键帮您写文章、广告大纲、博客、简历等。
3. 可以改写、翻译、解释网页上的任何文案。
4. 随时随地与Chatgpt、Claude、Bard、Bing等聊天，作为您的私人助理。
5. 可以自定义您专属的prompt，让Chatgpt能更好地为您服务。
6. 100%隐私政策。

⚙️ 具体功能清单:
➤ 强大的侧边栏 
  1. 随时与Chatgpt聊天，支持GPT-3.5，GPT-4。
  2. 可自定义prompt。
  4. 支持所有历史聊天查询。
➤ 快速唤醒 
  2. 浏览器内存占用小，Chatgpt体验不卡顿。
➤ 搜索增强 
  1. 支持Google、newBing、DuckDuckGo等搜索引擎。
  2. 搜索结果显示由Chatgpt提供的回答结果。
➤ 内置模板 
  1. 内置了80+的模板，支持、Gmail邮件撰写、LinkedIn个人简历撰写等。
  2. 不满足官方提供的模板，也可以自定义模板，让您更好地让Chatgpt为您服务。
以上功能都支持GPT-3.5,部分支持GPT-4。

⚒️ 今后可能支持的模型或功能

⚙️ 未来可能支持的模型:
- GPT-5模型
- claude模型
- brad模型
- Auto-Gpt
- Agent-GPt
- Excel-GPT
- MIni-Chatgpt
- SQL-GPT
- PRD-GPT
- Code-chatgpt


❓ 常见问题:
📌 是否考虑接入更多的模型？
  1. 正如上面所写，我们今后会一直保持与Chatgpt同步更新，如果今后有了GPT-5,我们也会第一时间支持。并且像Excel-Chatgpt，sql-Chatgpt，Mini-Chatgpt，claude，brad等提供的能力，我们会一直保持关注，或许在将来您也可以看到这些功能。

9️⃣ 易於使用
🔟 最重要的是，您的聲音至關重要！ 🗣 並且我們將持續改進

💻 功能特性:
💡 Chatbot:打開擴展，即可輕鬆聊天，談論任何事情，這一切都由GPT-4/GPT-3.5/Claude API/Bard支持，與ChatGPT/Claude/Bard同樣智能。
💡 Copywriting:利用人工智能能力輕鬆創建廣告文案。
💡 Prompt Library:這是一個promptbase，提供了大量的基於Chatgpt、GPT-3.5、GPT-4的prompt。
💡 Quick Action:翻譯、改述和解釋任何網頁上的文本。

❇️ 如何工作:
ChatBot AI助手使用ChatGPT、Claude、Bard等的強大功能來理解和響應您的聊天消息，並基於提供的模板生成文案。還可以翻譯、改述和解釋任何網頁上的文本。

📒 詳情介紹:
目前，支持 GPT-3、GPT-3.5、GPT-4 等模型。您可以一鍵編寫、翻譯、總結、改寫、解釋或回復任何文本，甚至包括專業代碼和行業核心知識。運行速度與 ChatGPT Plus 一樣快。

🔥 ChatBot AI助手的主要優勢和能力:
1. 對接最先進的GPT-3.5和GPT-4等多種模型。
2. 內置80多個模板，可以一鍵幫您寫文章、廣告大綱、博客、簡歷等。
3. 可以改寫、翻譯、解釋網頁上的任何文案。
4. 隨時隨地與Chatgpt、Claude、Bard、Bing等聊天，作為您的私人助理。
5. 可以自定義您專屬的prompt，讓Chatgpt能更好地為您服務。
6. 100%隱私政策。

⚙️ 具體功能清單:
➤ 強大的側邊欄 
  1. 隨時與Chatgpt聊天，支持GPT-3.5，GPT-4。
  2. 可自定義prompt。
  4. 支持所有歷史聊天查詢。
➤ 快速喚醒 
  2. 瀏覽器內存佔用小，Chatgpt體驗不卡頓。
➤ 搜索增強 
  1. 支持Google、newBing、DuckDuckGo等搜索引擎。
  2. 搜索結果顯示由Chatgpt提供的回答結果。
➤ 內置模板 
  1. 內置了80+的模板，支持、Gmail郵件撰寫、LinkedIn個人簡歷撰寫等。
  2. 不滿足官方提供的模板，也可以自定義模板，讓您更好地讓Chatgpt為您服務。
以上功能都支持GPT-3.5,部分支持GPT-4。

❓ 常見問題:
📌 是否考慮接入更多的模型？
  1. 正如上面所寫，我們今後會一直保持與Chatgpt同步更新，如果今後有了GPT-5,我們也會第一時間支持。並且像Excel-Chatgpt，sql-Chatgpt，Mini-Chatgpt，claude，brad等提供的能力，我們會一直保持關注，或許在將來您也可以看到這些功能。
